== Description ==
Returns a permalink for a [[Post Formats|post format]] archive.  This can be used anywhere if a post format is provided.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php $format_link = get_post_format_link($format); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$format|string|name of the post format.|Required|none}}
